name: HellBound (itch) (Canebo)
description:
HellBound is a fighting game with a blend of traditional and party elements.
Take down your opponent and be the last spirit standing!
Block attacks! Be careful, shields have a limit. Restore your shield's energy by attacking the opponent!

Local Multiplayer only. Controller support.

P1: A,D to move / W to jump / S, L to block / J to light attack / K to heavy attack
P2: Left and right arrow keys to move / Up arrow key to jump / Down arrow key to block / Left click to light attack / Right click to heavy attack

Semester Project
